ComicInfo.Summary:
As a winter storm descends upon Philadelphia, something, or some things sinister arrives with it. Will Belle be ready to weather what is coming her way, or will the icy grip of death add one more to its ever-growing ranks?
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 1 | | B | Cover B | Caanan White & Ceci de la Cruz | 2 | | C | Cover C | Mike Krome & Ula Mos | 3 | | D | 2021 Collectors Club Unlockable Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Paul Green & Ula Mos | Missing | | E | 2021 Collectors Club Unlockable Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 125 | Paul Green & Ula Mos | Missing | | F | 2021 Collectors Club Unlockable Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Paul Green & Ula Mos | Missing |
